extendedInfo.description: Use your fingers to build wood bridges and let the vehicles cross them. Use as less material as you can to get the highest score. This full version includes 30 stages.Solutions available at: http://www.edbasoftware.com*** Change Log ***1.0.0 - Initial version: 10 stages1.0.1 - Bug fixes (vehicles and highscores)1.1.0 - New stages: 15 stages1.2.0 - New Stages: 20 stages1.2.1 - Missing vehicles bugfix1.2.2 - Sound bugfix1.3.0 - New Stages: 25 stages now; menu improvements; smaller APK installer1.3.1 - Global highscores bugfix1.3.2 - Level 21 name change1.3.3 - Vehicles can now spin more than 360 degrees1.4.0 - Improvements; 2 new stages : 27 stages now1.5.0 - Freeze by phone calls/SMSs bugfix; 2 new stages : 29 stages now1.5.1 - Global scores bugfix1.5.2 - Back button functionality fix1.6.0 - Small improvements; 1 new stage : 30 stages now1.6.1 - Toggle buttons; "play next" menu; APP2SD; new help1.6.2 - "Vehicle has broken!" message1.6.3 - 2 new stages : 32 stages now1.7.0 - Scores bugfix

reviews.title: crap!
reviews.comment: free version is fun but the pay one. is impossible to beat. doesn\'t give enough material to complete floor. and some are stupid stunts where the bridge collapse after u complete but it counts!?  and it doesn\'t give any hints for the ones that don\'t have the material
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: Not worth the money. It\'s too hard. I bought it to build bridges, not swings, jumps, and other misc junk. Try again. And somehow people found ways to build bridges with 1 piece so high score or even top 10 score is near impossible.i personally hate it. And if you follow the guide the give you on line if even 1 piece isn\'t exactly the same the bridge will fail.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Far too difficult
reviews.comment: levels are nearly impossible and rely on physics exploits rather than sound structures. Decent engine let down by silly level design.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Utter crap
reviews.comment: First few levels good, but then not enough wood to build the bridge, also when I have built it, it comes up bridge failed when it obviously hasn\'t, too late in game to get a refund so don\'t bother buying it, someone needs to monitor what rubbish gets put on this market, people are getting ripped off, give me my money back
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Neh
reviews.comment: Good fun until it becomes too hard. Not a well balanced game. A difficulty setting would make this a 5 star game. Also showing stress on gurders would be amazing with gurders breaking in the middle not the attachment point.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hate it
reviews.comment: Hate it, bought it to have fun. It defies my engineering abilities
reviews.author: James Davis

reviews.title: This game sucks
reviews.comment: Way to difficult, not enough material and no hints wtf
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RIP OFF!!!!!
reviews.comment: The concept of this game is great but the maker, an idiot. You don\'t have enough rails to finish, they want you to defy gravity and all actuality. This game sucks, I want my money back....DO NOT BUY RIP OFF....RIP OFF!!!!!!!!! GIVE ME BACK MY MONEY.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ROBBERS!
reviews.comment: Useless game! Its a waste of money & time. Not enough materials... :s
reviews.author: James Kalayjian

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your money. Way too difficult.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The app seems to like certain construction methods only
reviews.comment: Even though it is solidly structured it will complain vehicle is broken when the train is almost through.
reviews.author: Damian Chin

reviews.title: Na
reviews.comment: This app is good but only the free version its not complete some of the stages are imposible nd they give u incomplete materiall so its not i dont recomend this version the free is better..i want my money bak
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Day Robbery
reviews.comment: Free version is fun and I felt robbed after buying this application. please avoid buying full version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Steal
reviews.comment: Waste of money I can\'t believe I paid for something I can\'t play stupid game its completely impossible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tough
reviews.comment: higher levels are challenging
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Stick with the free one.. this one is not the bridge designs your looking for. Its jumps right into the stupid stuff.
reviews.author: Andrew Rudy

reviews.comment: Fun recommend
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Building Materials?
reviews.comment: Needs more building materials in most stages; for instance two road boards when ten or better are needed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor level quality
reviews.comment: Besides the first 10 (normal) levels, the rest is just how to cheat a bridge rather than how to build one... It gets too complicated suddenly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun for the first few levels
reviews.comment: The title should read \"wood stunt ramp builder\" for most of the levels. If you want real bridge building, you won\'t find very many good levels here
reviews.author: A Google User
